name: Air Fighter 2017 - Plane Combat
description:
Air Fighter 2017 is a classic modern air shoot game! You will drive your aircraft to fight against enemy squadron. Come on to show your strength as an ace pilot in worldwide battlefield.
Drive your aircraft carefully to avoid denser and denser bullets in battlefield! How long will you survive in fierce modern dogfight? Try it now!
Features of Air Fighter 2017
- Amazing graphics and realistic dogfight

- Gorgeous barrage and amazing transformation
